description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Finally discover the answers to the mysteries behind what has been going on in this crazy house. Just try and keep your mind from unraveling in the process...
description.short: Finally discover the answers to the mysteries behind what has been going on in this crazy house. Just try and keep your mind from unraveling in the process...
